altTitles.ja: ロボットサラリーマン+踊るガイコツ

description.en:
"It's just desperate.'' A stingy major shareholder Toppi A robot employee who is being manipulated by a big man! Here is what a good old office worker looks like!? "Dancing Skeleton'' where a skeleton servant gets involved in a commotion and a police box with
a robot police officer Simultaneously includes "Robot No. 110," which depicts work! Commentary The 24th collection of Koremitsu Maetani's masterpieces is a combination
of Robot-kun's strange life as an office worker and the turmoil caused by the skeleton created by Dr. Toppi! Contains the author's last robot series "Robot No. 110"! <Robot office worker> Robot-kun, an employee of Sucharaka, decides to accompany the big shareholder Toppi on his Tokyo sightseeing tour at the orders of his president. !!
<Dancing Skeleton> Dr. Toppi, who was run away by his maid, thinks he can't afford the extravagance, so he stuffs an electronic brain into the skeleton and turns him into a servant...!? <Robot No. 110> In order to help the world, Dr. Toppi becomes a police officer. Aspiring robot no. 110. However, because he is clumsy, he has nothing to do!
